about_the_game:
Welcome to Mistress Of The Tower, a not-so-terrible school for witches and wizards, to learn how to build huge towers to illuminate the world (well, try).

To win, get the most points by building your tower, but be careful, if your construction is poorly designed it will end up in an impressive cloud of dust and debris.

Manipulate physical blocks to build your tower. Beware that physical block means forces, means gravity, means collision, means impact, means damage, means twisted, means high risk of disasters… :D

Tip: place your blocks regularly and accurately (easier said than done…)!

Each block placed earns you points, each block lost will be penalized, under these conditions, your test can quickly turn into a nightmare.

With your tower, reach your team's bonuses and dodge the penalties to preserve your blocks from destruction.

For the superior magicians who would find the first mastery too easy, for more (no) fun, 3 levels of difficulty

For more diversity, 3 tests:

  • the Infinite Tower (the only limit to the height of your tower is your incompetence);

  • the Tower of Time (build the tallest tower before the time limit);

  • the Chubby Tower (build the biggest tower without exceeding the defined height).

In short, all things related to towers...

Play alone or against 4 friends locally; up to 4 players on the keyboard (watch out for sausage fingers and cheaters) and up to 2 players per controller

Happy magical year in Mistress Of The Tower!
detailed_description:
Future update

Mistress Of The Tower has been cut back in content. Updates will be made to bring it up to my initial expectations. The addition of content will result in an increase in the base price of the game. So the sooner you buy, the better your wallet will feel ;)
